title: Field-Tested Strategies for Maximizing Virtual Classroom Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic use of online education platforms
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers/leaders to enhance virtual class operation competencies through effectiveness analysis of mathematics education.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to propose three or more instructional design strategies that minimize network issues in virtual classrooms
Learners will be able to suggest two or more physical/digital support measures to improve learners’ educational environments
Learners will be able to develop assessment tools that reduce the gap between expected outcomes and actual learning achievements by 10% or more
Students can utilize five or more effective interaction techniques in online math classes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
